The court found the developer guilty of computer misuse and sabotage.
The case highlights the potential risks associated with disgruntled employees.

clusters.title: For some people, music doesn’t connect with any of the brain’s reward circuits
clusters.neutral_headline: Some Individuals Lack Brain Reward Response to Music

items.title: For some people, music doesn’t connect with any of the brain’s reward circuits

ai_summary: Certain individuals do not experience the typical reward response to music.
Research indicates that music does not activate reward circuits in their brains.
This phenomenon is distinct from musical anhedonia, a lack of enjoyment.
The study explores the neurological basis of musical experience variations.
The findings offer insights into the complexities of human brain function.
